metadata.inclusion:
1. Locate the power outlet desired to be used with the Z-Wave Plus Siren.
2. Plug in the Z-Wave Siren and verify a single beep sound is heard.
3. The LED on the front of the unit will turn off when included.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Unplug and re-plug in your Z-Wave Plus Siren.
2. The device will play a long beep and the LED will begin to breathe when removed.
